Title: A Public Ransom

Actors: Helen Bonaparte, Goodloe Byron, Carlyle Edwards
Plot: Steven (Carlyle Edwards) is a self-serving, amoral author of very mediocre talent. When he stumbles across a crayon-scribbled missing child poster with a scrawled telephone number and the ...
